code: import{Types}from"./types";export var CLOSE_CART=function CLOSE_CART(){return{type:Types.CLOSE_CART};};export var OPEN_CART=function OPEN_CART(){return{type:Types.OPEN_CART};};export var SET_PRODUCTS=function SET_PRODUCTS(items){return{type:Types.SET_PRODUCTS,payload:items};};export var SELETED_PRODUCT=function SELETED_PRODUCT(item){return{type:Types.SELETED_PRODUCT,payload:item};};export var RMV_SELETED_PRODUCT=function RMV_SELETED_PRODUCT(){return{type:Types.RMV_SELETED_PRODUCT};};export var ADD_TO_CART=function ADD_TO_CART(item){return{type:Types.ADD_TO_CART,payload:item};};export var REMOVE_FROM_CART=function REMOVE_FROM_CART(id){return{type:Types.REMOVE_FROM_CART,payload:id};};export var REMOVE_ALL_CART=function REMOVE_ALL_CART(){return{type:Types.REMOVE_ALL_CART};};export var CHANGE_COUNT_CART=function CHANGE_COUNT_CART(){return{type:Types.CHANGE_COUNT_CART};};
